head.supplied: Melbourne botanic Garden ¶ 26 June 1862 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor in reply to your Circular N. 1351 ¶ to inform you, that the following is the classification of the Officers of this establishment,...

div.p: W62/4114, unit 749, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor in reply to your Circular N. 1351
Get copy of circular - if at PRO.
to inform you, that the following is the classification of the Officers of this establishment, according to the Civil Service Bill and the Appropriation Act for this year.
Class I. Ferdinand Mueller, M.D., Gov. Botanist & Director of the botanic Garden. (Salary £600 per annum)

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
